operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO f_file_borrow(file_id, form_id, file_code, project_code, project_name, customer_id, customer_name, apply_man_id, apply_man, apply_time, apply_dept, expect_return_time, borrow_reason, borrow_detail_id, borrow_detail, hand_over_man_id, hand_over_man, hand_over_time, receive_dept, receive_man_id, receive_man, hand_over_dept, receive_time, is_return, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
operation.sqlmap: INSERT INTO f_file_borrow (file_id, form_id, file_code, project_code, project_name, customer_id, customer_name, apply_man_id, apply_man, apply_time, apply_dept, expect_return_time, borrow_reason, borrow_detail_id, borrow_detail, hand_over_man_id, hand_over_man, hand_over_time, receive_dept, receive_man_id, receive_man, hand_over_dept, receive_time, is_return, raw_add_time) VALUES (#fileId#,#formId#, #fileCode#, #projectCode#, #projectName#, #customerId#, #customerName#, #applyManId#,#applyMan#,#applyTime#,#applyDept#,#expectReturnTime#,#borrowReason#,#borrowDetailId#,#borrowDetail#, #handOverManId#,#handOverMan#,#handOverTime#,#receiveDept#, #receiveManId#,#receiveMan#,#handOverDept#, #receiveTime#,#isReturn#, #rawAddTime#) <selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="id" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE f_file_borrow SET file_id=?, form_id=?, file_code=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man=?, apply_time=?, apply_dept=?, expect_return_time=?, borrow_reason=?, borrow_detail_id=?, borrow_detail=?, hand_over_man_id=?, hand_over_man=?, hand_over_time=?, receive_dept=?, receive_man_id=?, receive_man=?, hand_over_dept=?, receive_time=? WHERE id=?

operation.name: updateByFormId
operation.sql: UPDATE f_file_borrow SET file_id=?, form_id=?, file_code=?, project_code=?, project_name=?, customer_id=?, customer_name=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man=?, apply_time=?, apply_dept=?, expect_return_time=?, borrow_reason=?, borrow_detail_id=?, borrow_detail=?, hand_over_man_id=?, hand_over_man=?, hand_over_time=?, receive_dept=?, receive_man_id=?, receive_man=?, hand_over_dept=?, receive_time=? WHERE form_id=?

operation.name: updateByFileCode
operation.sql: UPDATE f_file_borrow SET is_return="IS" WHERE file_code=?

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap:
SELECT * from f_file_borrow where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="fFileBorrow.id" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> id = #fFileBorrow.id# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fFileBorrow.fileId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> file_id = #fFileBorrow.fileId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fFileBorrow.formId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> form_id = #fFileBorrow.formId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="fFileBorrow.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #fFileBorrow.projectCode# </isNotEmpty>
</dynamic> ORDER by id

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap: SELECT count(*) FROM f_file_borrow where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="fFileBorrow.id" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> id = #fFileBorrow.id# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fFileBorrow.fileId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> file_id = #fFileBorrow.fileId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fFileBorrow.formId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> form_id = #fFileBorrow.formId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="fFileBorrow.projectCode" prepend=" and "> project_code = #fFileBorrow.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
